title: Beyond the Classroom
text: An AHS education means more than just lectures and lab time. Our students are active in the community and in their fields, creating opportunities and forming relationships that shape their future. We believe that you’re always learning, no matter where you are.
From research to community engagement to student groups and events, whatever your interests are, you’ll find support to make your time here what you want it to be.
AHS student volunteers conduct training workshops for more than 300 home healthcare aides
Make the world your campus, participate in our study abroad program
The Health Tech Jam brought together AHS students and issued a challenge: develop a technological solution to a common health care problem — and do it in just six hours
Get involved in activities with students that share your interests
From seminars to bake sales, there's always something to do on campus
Providing recreational experiences which positively engage students through learning and leadership opportunities
Promoting an organizational culture and structure, grounded on the principles of access, equity and inclusion
Supporting as many students as possible in becoming effective and influential leaders in civil society
Dedicated to providing a welcoming environment for its students and fostering a sense of belonging
The online community for and by students, faculty and staff
Inside AHS connects you with news, events and resources hand-picked and posted by other AHS’ers. If you want to get a glimpse inside our college, this is the place!

AHS Magazine is the premier publication for and about members and friends of the UIC College of Applied Health Sciences community. Learn about all the great things happening in and beyond our classrooms.
